First strike
[i]Enigma[/i] – When Matthew, Enigmatic Thief enters, you may cloak the bottom card of your library.
[i]Locktouch[/i] – Whenever Matthew attacks and isn't blocked, you may turn target face-down permanent face-up.
[i]Wrath[/i] – Whenever Matthew deals combat damage to a player, cloak the bottom card of your library, then attacking creatures you control with [i]Crit[/i] abilities get +1/+0 until end of turn.
